name: MIRROR'S HEDGE [Demo]
description:
A puzzle game by:

Thomas Bugden - Art, Programming

Cameron Stuart - Gameplay Programming

Jack Komacek - Music

In MIRROR'S HEDGE you place and rotate mirrors to bounce the high frequency laser beam into the power crystal. You are also tasked with overcoming the hedges that block your way.

MIRROR'S HEDGE challenges the player's problem solving skills in a high frequency angular environment.
